sentences.sentence: Useing for asthma, heat dysentery, heat stranguria, and carbuncle.
sentences.translation: 用于痰热喘咳、热痢、热淋、痈肿疮毒等症。

sentences.sentence: Mine is the only purpose for which a wise man may desire to possess the Carbuncle.
sentences.translation: 我的目的只有一个，就是聪明人想要持有大红宝石的目的。

sentences.sentence: Yet not to have my wasted lifetime back again would I give up my hopes of the Great Carbuncle!
sentences.translation: 我就是放弃了寻找大红玉的希望，虚度的年华仍然一去不返了！
